title: Can ‘Cross and Classics Co-Exist? Mathieu van der Poel’s Most Daring Season Will Set Tone for Modern Multi-Disciplinarians
content:
To 'cross or not to 'cross? The outcome of MVDP's far-stretching 2024 season could crush or confirm the multi-discipline dream.

Read the full article at Can ‘Cross and Classics Co-Exist? Mathieu van der Poel’s Most Daring Season Will Set Tone for Modern Multi-Disciplinarians on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
